Reputation_Automation

AUTOMATE THE SYSTEM
THAT EARNS TRUST

RevuBro is built around three levers: request consistently, respond professionally, and route feedback so issues get resolved fast.

Automated Review Requests

Send personalized SMS and email review invites at the right moment, without you chasing customers.

AI-Powered Responses

Generate fast, on-brand responses so every review gets acknowledged and trust compounds over time.

Smart Review Routing

Capture private feedback and route issues to the right place so your team can resolve problems quickly.

FAQ

QUESTIONS, ANSWERED

If something is unclear, book onboarding and we will walk through your setup and your plan.

What is Google review automation, and how does it work?
RevuBro automates review requests by sending personalized invites via text or email after customer interactions. It also supports faster responses and a repeatable workflow so reviews grow without manual chasing.
Why are Google reviews important for my business?
Reviews build trust, increase conversion rates, and help you stand out locally. A consistent flow of recent reviews also signals that your business is active and credible.
How quickly will I see results?
Timing depends on your customer volume and follow-through. Most businesses see improved review velocity quickly once requests are automated and consistent.
Are there any contracts or commitments?
Plans are subscription-based. We will confirm your exact billing terms on the onboarding call before we process payment.
